author: Byron Pulsifer
message: Time is not a measure the length of a day or month or year but more a measure of what you have accomplished.
title: Thought of the day

author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe
message: Wherever a man may happen to turn, whatever a man may undertake, he will always end up by returning to the path which nature has marked out for him.
title: Thought of the day

author: Buddha
message: Holding on to anger is like grasping a hot coal with the intent of throwing it at someone else; you are the one who gets burned.
title: Thought of the day

author: African proverb
message: When there is no enemy within, the enemies outside cannot hurt you.
title: Thought of the day
